content.rendered:
Directed By Ali Abbas Zafar

Written By Ali Abbas Zafar. Sukhmani Sadana

Stars Diljit Dosanjh (Jogi). Kumud Mishra (Tejpal Arora). Mohd. Zeeshan Ayyub (SI Ravinder Chautala). Hiten Tejwani (Insp. Laali Katyal). Amyra Dastur (Kammo). Apinderdeep Singh (Sukhi – Jogi’s Brother). Paresh Pahuja (Kaleem Ansari). Neelu Kohli (Harinder – Jogi’s Mother). Arvinder Singh Gill (Harpal – Jogi’s Father). Mikhail Yawalkar (Diler Singh). Saurabh Chauhan (Insp. Kuldeep Sharma). Sadanand Patil (Head Const. Ram Manohar). Mandeep Kaur (Harleen – Jogi’s Bhabhi). Charu Kumar (Heer – Jogi’s Sister). Samarjit Singh Mahajan (Prabh – Heer’s Son). K.P. Singh (Tejinder – Heer’s Husband). Deep Singh (Gurinder – Jogi’s Neighbour). Divjyot Sabarwal (Gurinder’s Wife). Manthan Setia (Sunny – Gurinder’s Son). Tanjot Singh (Ginny – Gurinder’s Son). Nimrat Partap Singh (Kid Jogi). Sharanjit Singh (Gurudwara Bhai Jee). Harnoor Babbar (Tejpal’s Daughter). Noyrika Bhatheja (Shehnaaz – Kaleem’s Wife ). Dushyant Nand (Nakabandi Officer #1). Harcharanjit Singh Randhawa (Nakabandi Officer #2). Gurpiar Singh (Riot Victim Guy). Naveen Dhingra (Estate Manager). Sumit Verma (Supply Farm Employee). Gagan Deep Singh (Guard at Supply Farm). Navi Marjana (Bus Conductor). Rakesh Dogra (Bus Passenger #1). Karamjeet Singh (Bus Passenger #2). Ashok Yadav (Petrol Pump Attendant). Suraiya Khan (Young Mother in Truck). Talwinder Singh (Young Father in Truck). Vikram Rathore (Army Officer). Gursewak Singh (Cop at Mohali Border). Meenu Sharma (Laali’s Mother). Rishi Mehta (Halwai). Malkeet Rauni (Howrah Uncle). Aayushi Bhave Tilak (Laali’s Married Sister). Udita Bhalla (Kammo’s Friend).

Language Hindi

Producer Himanshu Kishan Mehra. Ali Abbas Zafar

Production AAZ Films
